definition: to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
old variant of 話|话[hua4]
it's all very well to talk, but getting things done is another matter (idiom)/to be an armchair expert/to blabber on
pinyin: zhan4 zhe5 shuo1 hua4 bu4 yao1 teng2

definition: to fail to keep to one's word/to break a promise
to keep one's promise/to mean what one says
to do as promised/to be as good as one's word/to honor one's word/to mean what one says
promises must be kept

sentences.english: The little child stammers in the presence of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 那小阿在陌生人面前说话就结巴。

sentences.english: She resembles her mother in the way she moves her hands when she talks.
sentences.chinese: 她说话时打手势的动作像她妈妈。

sentences.english: Deeply feared to influence him, distance Anne Ya Mei talked again and slowly withdrew room.
sentences.chinese: 深怕影响了他，程安雅没再说话，缓缓地退出房间。

sentences.english: I am not talking to you. I am chewing bubblegum.
sentences.chinese: 我没有和你说话，我在嚼泡泡糖。

sentences.english: The Wang Shi lip Yi moved several bottoms, didn't talk, but the facial expression is aggrieved.
sentences.chinese: 王氏嘴唇翳动了几下，没有说话，脸色却忿忿不平。

sentences.english: My parents speak and act like "old children", often make people laugh.
sentences.chinese: 我父母的说话做事像个“老顽童”，常让人忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: Natasha's voice rang out in the frost -bound air.
sentences.chinese: 在冰冻天气的冷空气中传来娜塔莎的说话声。

sentences.english: But neither girl by word or gesture revealed her blankness.
sentences.chinese: 但是没有一个姑娘用说话或者手势来表达她们的惆怅。
面向对象说话的思想本事。

sentences.english: KOTORI :Although he don't speak much with his mouth, he always speaks with his heart.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他不太开口说话，可是他总是用心在说呢。

sentences.english: Cloud dream frost looking at to sink to eliminate yet always doesn't talk.
sentences.chinese: 云梦霜看着沉消却始终没有说话。

sentences.english: Why can't the world come to an end?
sentences.chinese: 什么东西能跑不能走，会吹哨不会说话？

sentences.english: " You've got no right to talk to me like that, " Jesse said.
sentences.chinese: “你没有权利这样跟我说话”杰希说。
